main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted near Darmstadt, Germany, on 25 April 1952 by military personnel during a training flight.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant white light on a collision course with a C-47,The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,The object displayed high-speed climbing capabilities,The observer, Capt. Albert E. Prudence, is a credible rated officer with regular observation experience,The unidentified object took evasive action when illuminated by the aircraft's light.
witness description: military officers, Capt. Albert E. Prudence and Lt. Hartman
